sourcesContent:
import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' import Axios from "axios"; import axios from 'axios'; import { error } from 'jquery'; function Weather() { const [city, setCity] = useState("kolkata") const getWeatherInfo = () => { axios( { url: `api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=8881252aad8ef0d26bf595951220c34e`, method: 'GET', headers : { 'Content-Type':'application/json' } } ).then( response => { console.log(response.data) } ).catch((error) => {console.log(error)}) } useEffect(() => { getWeatherInfo(); },) return ( <>
{setCity(e.target.value)}} />
25.25°
Sunny
Pune, India
{new Date().toLocaleString() }

19:19 PM
Sunset

19:19 PM
Humidity

19:19 PM
Pressure

19:19 PM
Wind

) } export default Weather;
